page.title: 11Our house in St.Helens
page.content: Houses are our homes.There are different kinds of house.There are detached,semi-detached,terraced, flats and bungalows.I live in a terraced house. Terraced houses are joined in a big row.My house has had an extension put on.The kitchen is now twenty-two feet (7m) long.In it is a breakfast-bar and plenty of cupboards.Also downstairs is a porch,a huge hall,a living-room and a front room.We live mainly in the living-room near the kitchen. Up eleven stairs and one at the top we have three bedrooms and a bathroom. We also have an attic and a sunroof. A terraced house has no front garden,only a small one at the back. We mostly have a yard with a shed and a long set of gates.
